top_features.description: Activity level during their first week
top_features.explanation: 😴 No activity in week 1 engagement - significantly increases churn risk. User was disengaged this week.

top_features.description: Activity level during their fourth week
top_features.explanation: 🎯 Good activity in week 4 engagement (300 sessions) - significantly reduces churn risk.
